page.title: 08"Metheringham,Health Care"
page.content: In Metheringham there is a doctors surgery and pharmacy.There are four doctors:Dr Wright,Dr Grundy,Dr Birch, Dr Lyne and one nurse Mary Bennett. They have two Distict nurses, Sister Weatheral and staff nurse Maxine Leget.In March 1985 they had 4,288 patients and the nurse has about 20 patients per day.These are the areas which the doctors cover: Metheringham,Martin, Dunston, Nocton, Potterhanwroth, Scopwick, Kirby Green and Ashby de La Launde.All appointments must be made between 8.30am and 5.00pm from Monday to Friday.At all other times a doctor is on call with a "bleep system". In case of an emergency telephone 29921 which will go to Lincoln HOSPITAL.
